ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ARTEMIS-P1 Ephemeris, Heliocentric Trajectories, Heliographic, Heliographic Inertial, and Solar Ecliptic Coordinates, HelioWeb, Daily Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

Added ObservedRegion(s). Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to value in Version tag. ZCB
Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB
Fixed outdated Parameter units. Condensed existing description. Added 'Deprecated' Status. Added 'SupersededBy' Association. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: THEMIS B Heliocentric orbit in Heliographic Inertial, Heliographic rotating, and Solar Ecliptic coordinates at a daily cadence. For coordinate definitions see https://omniweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/coho/helios/coor_des.html.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge N.E. Papitashvili for use of the Data

InformationURL.Name: HG, HGI, and SE Coordinate System Definitions, NASA GSFC

InformationURL.Name: Satellite Situation Center (SSCWeb) System and Services, NASA GSFC
InformationURL.Description: Satellite Situation Center (SSCWeb) web page offering a variety of services that provide access to orbit trajectory graphics and listings, hosted by NASA GSFC

InformationURL.Name: HORIZONS Web Interface, NASA JPL
InformationURL.Description: HORIZONS Web Interface, a web page that provides limited access to the JPL HORIZONS system which can be used to generate ephemerides for solar system bodies
